code: @Override protected RestStatus getStatus(RefreshResponse response) {     return response.getStatus(). }

@Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(final RestRequest request, final NodeClient client) throws IOException {     RefreshRequest refreshRequest = new RefreshRequest(Strings.splitStringByCommaToArray(request.param("index"))).     refreshRequest.indicesOptions(IndicesOptions.fromRequest(request, refreshRequest.indicesOptions())).     return channel -> client.admin().indices().refresh(refreshRequest, new RestToXContentListener<RefreshResponse>(channel) {          @Override         protected RestStatus getStatus(RefreshResponse response) {             return response.getStatus().         }     }). }
